sentences: Kuldeep Joshi, an ex-student of Jagadguru Rambhadracharya Handicapped University, is the first visually-imapaired student in India to play tabla continuously for 12 hours.
Kuldeep Joshi is a native of the Dungarpur district of the  Rajasthan state of India.
He lost his eyesight at the age of eight.
His father, Manshankar Joshi, is a physical education teacher and his mother, Sharada Devi, is a housewife.
As of  2012, his elder brother was working in Mumbai and his younger brother was pursuing the Chartered Accountant course in Pune.
